claim_card.claim: The Fermi paradox is reframed as potential misalignment between what we search for and what enduring intelligence expresses.
claim_card.test_hook: Compare two search paradigms on the same datasets: (i) ‘message-like’ patterns vs (ii) ‘motif-like’ persistence patterns.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: not because intelligence is absent, but because we are misaligned
